attributes.review: I got this app and found out very quickly all the information was false. Do not get this app, you will not get the right information.
attributes.title: NOT A TRUE APP

attributes.review: For some reason this app hasn’t downloaded yet? Terrible design. Very flawed. Also, misinformation? Whoever codes for this app should get their degree revoked.
attributes.title: App hasn’t downloaded in 32 hours?

attributes.review: It was terrible, it lagged a lot and it wouldn’t let me use my phone properly and it was just terrible, don’t recommend it at all, absolutely terrible🤢🤮😡🤬
Glitchy and slow. Reports fake news. A song starts playing when you open the app that goes: “If you vote for Trump, then you’re a white supremacist.”
attributes.title: Dear Trump 2020 Supporters

attributes.review: This app is the most Corrupt app in the history of all apps... everyone is saying it. People are saying it’s fake news. Sad!
attributes.title: Worse app ever made- a lot of people are saying it

attributes.review: First of all this app took more than 29 hours to download, and it looks terrible!!! I expected more from my president 💕🧚🏻‍♂️✨ it’s ok little guy, youre doing the best you can
attributes.title: He tried his best ❤️

attributes.review: This is the worst app ever, it takes so long to download and as soon as I got it my phone immediately restarted and started to glitch🤬🤬
This app is known to sell your user data to the Russians because the Chinese weren’t good enough. Not saying either are bad, but why sell user data?
attributes.title: DATA NOT SAFE

attributes.review: Thought it said “Turnip app”. It did not help me grow my turnips. Instead it kept showing me pictures of oranges?? 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: It took forever to download and crashes my phone every time I try to open it.
attributes.title: This is a terrible app
